title: StupIDPol: Marxist critique of essentialism - Reddit
body: About. Analysis of identity politics and intersectionality. Notable examples of intersectionality and identity politics in action. r/stupidpol: Subreddit focused on critiquing capitalism and identity politics from a Marxist perspective.
